## Bio

My name is Ruth Enriquez! I recently earned my [Master's of Environmental Data Science](https://bren.ucsb.edu/masters-programs/master-environmental-data-science) from the University of California, Santa Barbara. I am an aspiring data scientist that hopes to combine my passions for technology, finance, and sustainability. I aim to pursue a career related to the topics of green technology, corporate sustainability, food waste, and/or scope emissions.
